name: Daily atmosphere  carbon dioxide concentration
description: This API provides on a quasi-daily basis, the amount of carbon dioxide (CO2) in the atmosphere from 2010.01.01 to the present. It is expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).

api_methods.name: Carbon dioxide endpoint
api_methods.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the current carbon dioxide levels in the atmosphere?
What's the latest data on atmospheric CO2 concentration?
I'd like to know the recent carbon dioxide concentration in the air.
Please provide the current CO2 levels in the atmosphere.
Could you give me the latest atmospheric carbon dioxide data?
What is the current concentration of CO2 in the atmosphere?
I need the most recent data on carbon dioxide levels in the air.
Can you show me the current atmospheric CO2 concentration?
What's the latest reading of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere?
I'd like to see the current levels of CO2 in the atmosphere.
